name: OCTORA AI
description: Octora AI is a context infrastructure platform that enables AI agents to access real-time data from Web2 and Web3 sources through the open Model Context Protocol (MCP). The project allows agents to connect to external tools, databases, APIs, files, and blockchain networks securely and efficiently. It provides SDKs for environments such as Unreal Engine, Unity, and VS Code, and includes a dedicated playground for developers to test contextual AI workflows. Octora AI aims to build modular and secure context pipelines for large language models (LLMs) and agent-based systems.
